1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Decode subtree.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Subtree.Decode
6  ( readSubtreeClauses,
7    decodeSubtreePattern,
8  ) where
9
10import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol           as S
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token            as S
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Tree             as S
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Subtree.Subtree  as S
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Subtree.Filter   as S
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Pattern    as P
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Tree.Pattern     as P
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Message            as Msg
20
21-- | Read subtree clauses from file.
22--
23--   >>> mapM_ (S.printToks . B.clauseTokens) =<< B.abortLeft =<< readSubtreeClauses "subtree.txt"
24--   ********** > "a1"
25--   TText /0.10.0/ TextRaw ">"
26--   TText /0.10.2/ TextQQ "a1"
27--   TOpen /0.0.0/ "("
28--   TText /0.11.2/ TextRaw "-"
29--   TText /0.11.4/ TextQQ "bb"
30--   TText /0.0.0/ TextRaw "|"
31--   TText /0.12.2/ TextRaw "-"
32--   TText /0.12.4/ TextQQ "cc"
33--   TClose /0.0.0/ ")"
34--
35readSubtreeClauses :: FilePath -> B.IOAb [S.TokenClause]
36readSubtreeClauses path =
37    do ls' <- S.readClauses path
38       return $ case ls' of
39         Left a -> Left a
40         Right ls -> subtreeClause O.<#> ls
41
42-- | Insert open/sep/close to subtree clause.
43subtreeClause :: S.TokenClause -> B.Ab S.TokenClause
44subtreeClause cl = cl' where
45    cl' = case clauseFirstElem cl of
46            Just (P.TRaw s) | s `elem` [">", ">>"] ->
47                do toks <- branch (B.lineTokens <$> B.clauseLines cl)
48                   Right $ cl { B.clauseTokens = S.sweepToken $ concat toks }
49            _ -> Right cl
50
51    branch = B.indentBranch size test open sep close
52
53    size (S.TSpace _ n) = Just n
54    size _              = Nothing
55
56    test (P.TRaw s) = s `elem` [">", ">>", "-", "+"]
57    test _          = False
58
59    open   = S.TOpen  B.def "("
60    sep    = S.TText  B.def S.TextRaw "|"
61    close  = S.TClose B.def ")"
62
63clauseFirstElem :: B.CodeClause a -> Maybe a
64clauseFirstElem cl =
65    case B.clauseLines cl of
66      [] -> Nothing
67      ln : _ -> case B.lineTokens ln of
68                  [] -> Nothing
69                  tok : _ -> Just tok
70
71-- | Decode token trees to subtree patterns.
72--
73--   >>> S.withTrees decodeSubtreePattern "- \"Z1\""
74--   Right [SubtreeL (SubtreeEq "Z1")]
75--
76--   >>> S.withTrees decodeSubtreePattern "> \"Y1\" ( - \"Z1\" )"
77--   Right [SubtreeB (SubtreeEq "Y1") [SubtreeL (SubtreeEq "Z1")]]
78--
79--   >>> S.withTrees decodeSubtreePattern "> \"Y1\" ( - \"Z1\" | - \"Z2\" )"
80--   Right [ SubtreeB (SubtreeEq "Y1") [ SubtreeL (SubtreeEq "Z1")
81--                                     , SubtreeL (SubtreeEq "Z2") ]]
82--
83--   >>> S.withTrees decodeSubtreePattern ">> \"Y1\" ( - \"Z1\" )"
84--   Right [SubtreeR (SubtreeEq "Y1") [SubtreeL (SubtreeEq "Z1")]]
85--
86--   >>> S.withTrees decodeSubtreePattern ">> \"Y1\" ( - A B /z \"Z1\" )"
87--   Right [SubtreeR (SubtreeEq "Y1") [SubtreeL (SubtreeText ["A", "B"] (TermName EQ "z")) (SubtreeEq "Z1")]]
88--
89decodeSubtreePattern :: [S.Tree] -> B.Ab [S.SubtreePattern]
90decodeSubtreePattern = pats where
91    pats ts = pat O.<#> S.divideTreesByBar ts
92
93    pat (P.LRaw "-" : ts) = do (ts', term) <- splitClassTerm ts
94                               (f, _) <- filt ts'
95                               Right $ S.SubtreeL term f
96    pat (P.LRaw ">" : ts) = do (ts', term) <- splitClassTerm ts
97                               S.SubtreeB term </> ts'
98    pat (P.LRaw ">>" : ts) = S.SubtreeR </> ts
99    pat _ = Msg.adlib "Unknown subtree pattern"
100
101    filt []                          = Right (S.subtreeId, [])
102    filt (P.LQq s : ts)              = S.subtreeEq s <+> ts
103    filt (P.LRaw "?" : P.LQq s : ts) = S.subtreeKeep s <+> ts
104    filt (P.LRaw "!" : P.LQq s : ts) = S.subtreeOmit s <+> ts
105    filt [P.BGroup ts]               = do ps <- pats ts
106                                          Right (S.subtreeId, ps)
107    filt _ = Msg.adlib "Unknown subtree filter"
108
109    k </> ts = do (f, ps) <- filt ts
110                  Right $ k f ps
111    f <+> ts = do (g, ps) <- filt ts
112                  Right (f O.++ g, ps)
113
114splitClassTerm :: [S.Tree] -> B.Ab ([S.Tree], S.SubtreeTerm)
115splitClassTerm ts0 = loop [] ts0 where
116    loop cs (P.LRaw c : ts)  = loop (c : cs) ts
117    loop cs (P.LTerm n : P.LRaw "seq" : ts)
118        = right cs (ts, S.SubtreeSeq (reverse cs) (S.toTermName n))
119    loop cs (P.LTerm n : ts)
120        = right cs (ts, S.subtreeTexts (reverse cs) (S.toTermName n))
121    loop _ _ = Right (ts0, S.SubtreeNone)
122
123    right cs result
124        | null cs    = Msg.adlib "Expect one or more judgement classes"
125        | otherwise  = Right result
